scripts.db:migrate:staging: wrangler d1 migrations apply TREKSISTEM_DB --env staging
scripts.db:migrate:dev: wrangler d1 migrations apply TREKSISTEM_DB --env development
scripts.workflow:validate: find .github/workflows -name '*.yml' -exec yamllint {} \; || echo 'yamllint not installed, skipping YAML validation'
scripts.docs:serve: python3 -m http.server 8080 -d docs || python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8080 docs
scripts.health:check: curl -f http://localhost:8787/api/health || echo 'Worker not running locally'
scripts.logs:pages: echo 'Check Cloudflare Pages dashboard for frontend logs'
scripts.test:api:local: newman run postman/Treksistem_API_Working.postman_collection.json -e postman/Local_Dev.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export postman/report.html --reporter-htmlextra-title 'Treksistem API Test Report' --reporter-htmlextra-logs
scripts.test:api:staging: newman run postman/Treksistem_API_Working.postman_collection.json -e postman/Staging_Sandbox.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export postman/report-staging.html --reporter-htmlextra-title 'Treksistem Staging API Test Report' --reporter-htmlextra-logs
